name: Surr's Simple Inventory 2: Showcase Project
description:
A showcase project demonstrating the functionality of Surr's Simple Inventory 2. All you have to do is pick up the guns and shoot the red cubes, more ammo spawns in after enough has been used.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Tab: Open/Close Inventory

Left Click: Fire gun, preview item

Right Click: Drag item around

E: Interact/Pick up items

R: Reload/Rotate item
